text:
@dbongino Andrew Cuomo put #Covid19 patients in unprepared & not equipped nursing homes. Nursing home death in New York is 6% of USA & 19+% of #NY numbers.

Washington successfully controlled the coronavirus spread in nursing home, whereas New York promoted it even w #WA example.
